AEGON Taiwan joins the fight against SARS 
A recent initiative by AEGON Taiwan for the benefit of community and society in general is against SARS 
(Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome). AEGON Taiwan prepared and distributed tens of thousands of 
pamphlets containing health tips and relevant information to employees, agents, policyholders and the  
general public. 
AEGON Taiwan also launched a special campaign, offering NTD 3,000 (EUR 70) per day as supplementary 
allowance to employees, family and policyholders wi th AEGON life insurance or medical insurance upon 
diagnosis of SARS.
